txt.en:
Welcome to your new home! Two buttons on the minimap are visible now. One button opens up the Housing Management panel which allows you to pay upkeep, unlock chests, and change permissions for your house.

The other button toggles decoration mode on and off. While in decoration mode, decoration hooks become visible and you can use them much the same way as you slot equipment.

If you need more decorations, visit the Furnisher in the centre of your Neighbourhood.
